home.addToHomeScreen: Pridėkite aplikaciją į darbalaukį, lengvesniam pasiekiamumui ir geresnei patirčiai.

project.importText: Importuokite savo projektus ir užduotis iš kitų tiekėjų į Vikunja:

demo.title: Ši aplinka yra demontracinės būsenos. Nenaudokite realių duomenų!
demo.accountWillBeDeleted: Tavo paskyra bus ištrinta, įskaitant visus projektus, užduotis ir prisegtukus su tuo susijusius.

ready.checkApiUrl: Prašau patikrinti ar Api nuoroda yra teisinga.
ready.noApiUrlConfigured: Jokia Api nuoroda nebuvo sukonfiguruota. Prašau, tai padaryti žemiau:

offline.title: Esi atsijungęs(-usi).
offline.text: Prašau patikrinti interneto ryšį ir bandyti dar kartą.

auth.usernameEmail: Vartotojo vardas arba el. pašto adresas
auth.resetPasswordSuccess: Patikrink savo pašto dėžutę! Turėjai gauti laišką, kaip atnaujinti slaptažodį.
auth.confirmEmailSuccess: Sėkmingai patvirtinai savo el. paštą. Dabar gali prisijungti.
auth.openIdGeneralError: Įvyko klaida bandant identifikuoti su trečiąja šalimi.
auth.emailInvalid: Prašome įvesti galiojantį el. pašto adresą.
auth.usernameMustNotLookLikeUrl: Vartotojo vardas negali atrodyti kaip nuoroda.

settings.title: Nustatymai
settings.updateEmailSuccess: El. paštas buvo sėkmingai atnaujintas. Nusiuntėme nuorodą patvirtinimui.

general.title: Bendriniai nustatymai
general.name: Mano vardas
general.emailReminders: Send me reminders for tasks via email
general.overdueReminders: Send me a summary of my undone overdue tasks every day
general.discoverableByName: Leisti kitiems vartotojas mane pridėti prie komandų ar projektų radus mano vardą paieškoje
general.discoverableByEmail: Allow other users to add me as a member to teams or projects when they search for my full email
general.playSoundWhenDone: Play a sound when marking tasks as done
general.externalUserNameChange: Tavo vardą valdo prisijungimo tiekėjas ({provider}). Norint pakeisti, atnaujinkite pasirinkimą.

totp.title: Two Factor Authentication
totp.finishSetupPart1: To finish your setup, use this secret in your TOTP app (Google Authenticator or similar):
totp.finishSetupPart2: After that, enter a code from your app below.
totp.scanQR: Alternatively you can scan this QR code:
totp.passcodePlaceholder: A code generated by your TOTP application
totp.setupSuccess: You've successfully set up two factor authentication!
totp.confirmSuccess: You've successfully confirmed your TOTP setup and can use it from now on!
totp.disableSuccess: Two factor authentication was successfully disabled.

caldav.title: CalDAV
caldav.howTo: You can connect Vikunja to CalDAV clients to view and manage all tasks from different clients. Enter this url into your client:
caldav.more: More information about CalDAV in Vikunja
caldav.tokensHowTo: You can use a CalDAV token to use instead of a password to log in the above endpoint.
caldav.wontSeeItAgain: Write it down, you won't be able to see it again.
caldav.mustUseToken: You need to create a CalDAV token if you want to use CalDAV with a third party client. Use the token as the password.

avatar.title: Avatar
avatar.setSuccess: The avatar has been set successfully!

appearance.title: Color Scheme
appearance.setSuccess: Saved change of color scheme to {colorScheme}

apiTokens.title: API Tokens
apiTokens.general: API tokens allow you to use Vikunja's API without user credentials.
apiTokens.permissionExplanation: Permissions allow you to scope what an api token is allowed to do.
apiTokens.permissionRequired: Please select at least one permission from the list.
apiTokens.tokenCreatedSuccess: Here is your new api token: {token}
apiTokens.tokenCreatedNotSeeAgain: Store it in a secure location, you won't see it again!

delete.text1: Are you sure you want to delete the token "{token}"?
delete.text2: This will revoke access to all applications or integrations using it. You cannot undo this.

attributes.title: Pavadinimas
attributes.titlePlaceholder: Enter a title you will recognize later

deletion.title: Delete your Vikunja Account
deletion.text1: Profilio ištrynimas yra neatšaukiamas. Visi projektai, užduotys ir kita susijusi informacijas bus pašalinta.
deletion.text2: Norėdama -s tęsti, įvesk savo slaptažodį. Gausi email'ą su tolimesnėmis instrukcijomis.
deletion.text3: Norėdami tęsti, spauskite mygtuką žemiau. Gausite el. laišką su tolimesnėmis instrukcijomis.
deletion.requestSuccess: Tavo užklausa sėkminga. Gausi email'ą su tolimesnėmis instrukcijomis.
deletion.confirmSuccess: Sėkmingai patvirtinai paskyros ištrynimą. Ištrinsime tavo paskyrą per tris dienas.
deletion.scheduledCancel: Norėdama -s nutraukti paskyros ištrynimą, spausk čia.
deletion.scheduledCancelText: Norėdama -s nutraukti paskyros ištrynimą, įveskite slaptažodį žemiau:
deletion.scheduledCancelButton: Norint atšaukti paskyros ištynimą, prašome spausti mygtuką žemiau:
deletion.scheduledCancelSuccess: We will not delete your account.

export.title: Export your Vikunja data
export.description: Tu gali prašyti gauti visus Vikunja duomenis. Į tai įeina, Projektai, Užduotys ir viskas, kas su jais susiję. Tu gali savo duomenis vėliau įkelti į bet kurią Vikunja aplinką naudojantis migracijos funkcija.
export.descriptionPasswordRequired: Please enter your password to proceed:
export.request: Request a copy of my Vikunja Data
export.success: You've successfully requested your Vikunja Data! We will send you an email once it's ready to download.

project.archivedMessage: This project is archived. It is not possible to create new or edit tasks for it.
project.title: Pavadinimas
project.search: Type to search for a project…
project.searchSelect: Click or press enter to select this project

create.addProjectRequired: Please specify a project or set a default project in the settings.

archive.title: Archive "{project}"
archive.unarchiveText: You will be able to create tasks or edit it.
archive.archiveText: You won't be able to edit this project or create tasks until you un-archive it.

background.title: Set project background
background.upload: Choose a background from your pc
background.success: The background has been set successfully!
background.removeSuccess: The background has been removed successfully!

delete.title: Delete "{project}"
delete.text1: Are you sure you want to delete this project and all of its contents?
delete.text2: This includes all tasks and CANNOT BE UNDONE!
delete.tasksToDelete: This will irrevocably remove approx. {count} tasks.
delete.tasksAndChildProjectsToDelete: This will irrevocably remove approx. {tasks} tasks and {projects} projects.
delete.noTasksToDelete: This project does not contain any tasks, it should be safe to delete.

duplicate.title: Duplicate this project
duplicate.label: Dubliuoti
duplicate.text: Select a parent project which should hold the duplicated project:

edit.title: Edit "{project}"
edit.identifierTooltip: Projekto Id gali būti naudojamas unikaliai identifikuoti užduotį tarp projektų. Galima palikti tuščia, norint funkciją deaktyvuoti.
edit.descriptionPlaceholder: Enter a description for this project, hit '/' for more options…

links.title: Share Links
links.explanation: Share Links allow you to easily share a project with other users who don't have an account on Vikunja.
links.name: Vardas (pasirinktinai)
links.nameExplanation: Visi veiksmai atlikti po pasidalinta nuoroda matysis šiuo pavadinimu.
links.passwordExplanation: Prisijungiant, vartotojas privalės įvesti savo slaptažodį.
links.removeText: Are you sure you want to remove this link share? It will no longer be possible to access this project with this link share. This cannot be undone!

userTeam.removeText: Are you sure you want to remove this {sharable} from the {type}? This cannot be undone!
userTeam.removeSuccess: The {sharable} was successfully removed from the {type}.

gantt.title: Gantt
gantt.noDates: Ši užduotis dar neturi nurodytos datos.

kanban.title: Kanban
kanban.doneBucketHint: All tasks moved into this bucket will automatically marked as done.
kanban.doneBucketHintExtended: All tasks moved into the done bucket will be marked as done automatically. All tasks marked as done from elsewhere will be moved as well.
kanban.doneBucketSavedSuccess: The done bucket has been saved successfully.
kanban.defaultBucketHint: When creating tasks without specifying a bucket, they will be added to this bucket.
kanban.defaultBucketSavedSuccess: The default bucket has been saved successfully.
kanban.deleteLast: You cannot remove the last bucket.
kanban.deleteBucketText1: Are you sure you want to delete this bucket?
kanban.deleteBucketText2: This will not delete any tasks but move them into the default bucket.
kanban.deleteBucketSuccess: The bucket has been deleted successfully.
kanban.bucketTitleSavedSuccess: The bucket title has been saved successfully.
kanban.bucketLimitSavedSuccess: The bucket limit been saved successfully.
kanban.bucketLimitReached: Pasiekėte buketo limitą. Ištrinkite užduotis arba padidinkite limitą norėdami pridėti naujas užduotis.

webhooks.title: „Webhook“'ai
webhooks.eventsHint: Select all events this webhook should recieve updates for (within the current project).
webhooks.deleteText: Are you sure you want to delete this webhook? External targets will not be notified of its events anymore.
webhooks.secretHint: If provided, all requests to the webhook target URL will be signed using HMAC.
webhooks.secretDocs: Check out the docs for more details about how to use secrets.

views.title: Title
views.deleteText: Are you sure you want to remove this view? It will no longer be possible to use it to view tasks in this project. This action won't delete any tasks. This cannot be undone!
views.onlyAdminsCanEdit: Tik projekto administratoriai gali keisti atvaizdavimą.

filters.title: Filtrai
filters.fromView: Dabartinis vaizdas turi nustatytą filtrą taip pat:
filters.fromViewBoth: It will be used in combination with what you enter here.

attributes.title: Pavadinimas
attributes.descriptionPlaceholder: Įvesti filtro aprašymą, spausti '/' norint gauti daugiau pasirinkčių…
attributes.requireAll: Reikalauti, kad visi filtrai būtų tikri, kad užduotys būtų rodomos

create.title: Naujas išsaugotas filtras
create.description: Išsaugotas filtras yra virtualus projektas, kuris yra generuojamas iš pasirinktų filtrų, kiekvieną kartą jį paleidžiant.

delete.text: Ar esi tikra-s, kad nori ištrinti išsaugotą filtrą?

help.intro: Norėdami filtruoti užduotis, galite naudoti sintaksę panašią į SQL. Galimi filtravimo laukai įtraukia:
help.canUseDatemath: You can use date math to set relative dates. Click on the date value in a query to find out more.

fields.doneAt: Data ir laikas, kada užduotis buvo atlikta
fields.project: The project the task belongs to (only available for saved filters, not on a project level)
fields.reminders: The reminders of the task as a date field, will return all tasks with at least one reminder matching the query
fields.created: Laikas ir data, kai užduotis buvo sukurta
fields.updated: Data ir laikas, kada užduotis buvo pakeista

operators.in: Matches any value in a comma-seperated list of values
operators.notIn: Matches any value not present in a comma-seperated list of values

logicalOperators.intro: To combine multiple conditions, you can use the following logical operators:
logicalOperators.and: IR operatorius, sutampa jei visos sąlygos yra tiesa
logicalOperators.or: ARBA operatorius, sutampa jei bet kuri sąlyga yra tiesa

examples.intro: Čia pateikiami keli filtravimo užklausos pavyzdžiai:
examples.dueDatePast: Sutampa su užduotimis su praeities data
examples.undoneHighPriority: Matches undone tasks with priority level 3 or higher
examples.assigneesIn: Matches tasks assigned to either "user1" or "user2"
examples.priorityOneOrTwoPastDue: Matches tasks with priority level 1 or 2 and a due date in the past

migrate.title: Importuoti iš kitų paslaugų tiekėjų
migrate.description: Paspauskite ant trečiosios šalies logotipo norint pradėti.
migrate.descriptionDo: Vikunja importuos visus sąrašus, užduotis, užrašus, priminimus ir dokumentus prie kurių tu turi prieigą.
migrate.authorize: Autorizuoti Vikunja prieigą prie tavo {name} paskyros, spauskite mygtuką žemiau.
migrate.alreadyMigrated1: Atrodo, kad jau importavai savo info is {name} {date}.
migrate.alreadyMigrated2: Dar kartą importuoti galima, tačiau tai gali sukurti dublikatus. Ar tęsti?
migrate.confirm: Aš įsitikinęs, prašau pradėti migraciją dabar!
migrate.importUpload: Importuoti duomenis iš {name} į Vikunja, spausk mygtuką žemiau, norėdamas pasirinkti failą.
migrate.migrationStartedWillReciveEmail: Vikunja dabar importuos tavo sąrašus/projektus, užduotis, užrašus, priminimus ir dokumentus iš {service}. Kadangi tai užtruks, atsiųsime el. laišką, kai bus baigta. Gali uždaryti šį langą.
migrate.migrationInProgress: A migration is currently in progress. Please wait until it is done.

label.title: Etiketės
label.description: Paspausk ant etiketės norėdamas ją redaguoti. Tu gali keisti etiketes, kurias pats sukūrei, tu gali naudoti visas etiketes, kurios yra susietos su užduotimis, projektų, prie kurių tu turi prieigą.

edit.forbidden: Tau neleidžiama redaguoti šios etiketės, kadangi ji tau nepriklauso.

sharing.passwordRequired: Šis pasidalintas projektas reikalauja slaptažodžio. Įveskite jį žemiau:

editor.imageTooltip: Upload an image from your computer.
editor.placeholder: Rašykite tekstą arba spauskite '/' norėdami matyti daugiau pasirinkčių…

multiselect.selectPlaceholder: Spustelėkite arba spauskite įvesties klavisą norėdami pasirinkti

datemathHelp.canuse: Galite naudoti datų matematiką norint filtruoti aktualias datas.
datemathHelp.title: Datų matematika
datemathHelp.intro: Nurodyti reliatyvias datas, kurios yra išpręstos eigoje Vikunjos kai pritaikomas filtras.
datemathHelp.expression: Each Date Math expression starts with an anchor date, which can either be {0}, or a date string ending with {1}. This anchor date can optionally be followed by one or more maths expressions.
datemathHelp.similar: These expressions are similar to the ones provided by {0} and {1}.

examples.datePlusMonth: {0} plius veianas mėnuo nuo 00:00 tos dienos

task.doneSuccess: Užduotis buvo sėkmingai pažymėta kaip baigta.
task.undoneSuccess: Užduotis buvo sėkmingai atžymėta kaip atlikta.

detail.chooseDueDate: Paspauskite čia norėdami pakeisti atlikimo datą
detail.chooseEndDate: Spauskite čia norėdami nustatyti pabaigos datą
detail.deleteSuccess: The task has been deleted successfully.

delete.text1: Are you sure you want to remove this task?
delete.text2: This will also remove all attachments, reminders and relations associated with this task and cannot be undone!

subscription.subscribedTaskThroughParentProject: You can't unsubscribe here because you are subscribed to this task through its project.
subscription.subscribedProject: You are currently subscribed to this project and will receive notifications for changes.
subscription.notSubscribedProject: You are not subscribed to this project and won't receive notifications for changes.
subscription.subscribedTask: You are currently subscribed to this task and will receive notifications for changes.
subscription.notSubscribedTask: You are not subscribed to this task and won't receive notifications for changes.

attachment.title: Attachments
attachment.deleteText1: Ar esi tikra -s, kad nori ištrinti šį prisegtuką {filename}?
attachment.copyUrlTooltip: Nukopijuoti nuorodą šio prisegtuko, kaip paprastą tekstą

comment.title: Comments
comment.placeholder: Pridėk komentarą, spausk '/' dėl daugiau pasirinkčių…
comment.deleteText1: Ar tikrai nori ištrinti šį komentarą?

description.placeholder: Įvesti aprašą, spausti '/' norint gauti daugiau pasirinkčių…

label.addCreateSuccess: Etiketė buvo sėkmingai sukurta ir pridėta.

delete.text1: Ar esi tikra(-s), kad nori ištrinti šią etiketę?
delete.text2: Šis veiksmas ištins tai iš visų užduočių ir nebus galima atkurti.

relation.searchPlaceholder: Type search for a task to add as related…
relation.deleteText1: Are you sure you want to delete this task relation?
relation.taskRequired: Prašome pasirinkti užduotį arba įvesti užduoties pavadinimą.

quickAddMagic.hint: Use magic prefixes to define due dates, assignees and other task properties.
quickAddMagic.title: Quick Add Magic
quickAddMagic.intro: When creating a task, you can use special keywords to directly add attributes to the newly created task. This allows to add commonly used attributes to tasks much faster.
quickAddMagic.label1: Norėdama -s pridėti etiketę, paprasčiausiai naudoti etiketės prefikso pavadinimą su {prefix}.
quickAddMagic.label2: Vikunja pirmiausiai patikrins ar etiketė egzistuoja, ir sukurs, jei neegzistuoja.
quickAddMagic.label3: Norint naudoti tarpus, paprasčiausiai pridėkite " ar ' prieš etiketės pavadinimą.
quickAddMagic.priority1: To set a task's priority, add a number 1-5, prefixed with a {prefix}.
quickAddMagic.priority2: Kuo didesnis skaičius, tuo aukštesnis prioritetas.
quickAddMagic.assignees: Norint tiesiogiai priskirti užduotį vartotojui, pridėkite vartotojo vardą kaip prefiksą su {prefix} prie užduoties.
quickAddMagic.project1: Nustatyti užduoties projektą, įveskite prefiksą su {prefix}.
quickAddMagic.project2: Tai bus klaida jei projektas neegzituoja.
quickAddMagic.project3: Norint naudoti tarpus, paprasčiausiai pridėkite " ar ' apie projekto pavadinimą.
quickAddMagic.date: Any date will be used as the due date of the new task. You can use dates in any of these formats:
quickAddMagic.dateWeekday: any weekday, will use the next date with that date
quickAddMagic.dateNth: will use the {day}th of the current month
quickAddMagic.dateTime: Combine any of the date formats with "{time}" (or {timePM}) to set a time.
quickAddMagic.repeatsDescription: Norėdama -s nustatyti, kad užduotis kartotųsi tam tikru intervalu, paprasčiausiai pridėk '{suffix}' prie užduoties teksto. Kiekis turi būti išreikštas skaičiumi, tačiau gali būti ir praleistas (žr. pavyzdžius).

team.title: Teams
team.noTeams: You are currently not part of any teams.

edit.title: Edit Team "{team}"
edit.userAddedSuccess: The team member was successfully added.
edit.madeMember: The team member was successfully made member.
edit.madeAdmin: The team member was successfully made admin.

delete.text1: Are you sure you want to delete this team and all of its members?
delete.text2: All team members will lose access to projects shared with this team. This CANNOT BE UNDONE!

deleteUser.header: Remove a user from the team
deleteUser.text1: Are you sure you want to remove this user from the team?
deleteUser.text2: They will lose access to all projects this team has access to. This CANNOT BE UNDONE!
deleteUser.success: Naudotojas buvo sėkmingai ištrintas iš komandos.

leave.title: Leave team
leave.text1: Are you sure you want to leave this team?
leave.text2: Prarasite visas teises, kurias turi ši komanda. Jei persigalvotum, reikės komandos administratoriaus pagalbos, kad pridėtų atgal.

attributes.name: Komandos Pavadinimas
attributes.descriptionPlaceholder: Aprašykite komandą čia, spauskite '/' dėl daugiau opcijų…
attributes.isPublicDescription: Padaryk komandą viešai randamą. Kai įgalinta, bet kas gali pasidalinti projektu su komanda, net nebūdama -s tiesioginiu komandos nariu.

keyboardShortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
keyboardShortcuts.allPages: These shortcuts work on all pages.
keyboardShortcuts.currentPageOnly: Esami trumpiniai veikia tik dabartiniame puslapyje.
keyboardShortcuts.somePagesOnly: Šie trumpiniai veikia tik kai kuriuose puslapiuose.

task.title: Task Page
task.assign: Assign this task to a user
task.dueDate: Change the due date of this task
task.attachment: Add an attachment to this task
task.related: Modify related tasks of this task
task.color: Change the color of this task
task.priority: Change the priority of this task
task.favorite: Mark this task as favorite / unfavorite

menu.cantArchiveIsDefault: You cannot archive this because it is your default project.
menu.cantDeleteIsDefault: You cannot delete this because it is your default project.

apiConfig.error: Could not find or use Vikunja installation at "{domain}". Please check if the url has the correct format and you can reach it when accessing it directly and try again.

loadingError.failed: Loading failed, please {0}. If the error persists, please {1}.

notification.title: Notifications
notification.none: You don't have any notifications. Have a nice day!
notification.explainer: Notifications will appear here when actions projects or tasks you subscribed to happen.
notification.markAllReadSuccess: Successfully marked all notifications as read.

quickActions.hint: Gai naudoti {project} sutrumpinti projektų paiešką. Sujungti {project} ar {label} (etiketes) paieškos užklausoje norint ieškoti užduoties su tomis etiketėmis ar tame projekte. Naudok {assignee} norėdama(-s) ieškoti komandu.
quickActions.newProject: Enter the title of the new project…
quickActions.newTask: Enter the title of the new task…
quickActions.createTask: Create a task in the current project ({title})

error.0001: You're not allowed to do that.
error.1002: A user with this email address already exists.
error.1006: Could not get the user id.
error.1012: Email address of the user not confirmed.
error.1015: TOTP is already enabled for this user.
error.1016: TOTP is not enabled for this user.
error.1018: The user avatar type setting is invalid.
error.2002: Some of the request data was invalid.
error.3004: You need to have read permissions on that project to perform that action.
error.3005: The project title cannot be empty.
error.3006: The project share does not exist.
error.3007: A project with this identifier already exists.
error.3008: The project is archived and can therefore only be accessed read only. This is also true for all tasks associated with this project.
error.4001: The task title cannot be empty.
error.4003: All bulk editing tasks must belong to the same project.
error.4004: Need at least one task when bulk editing tasks.
error.4006: You can't set a parent task as the task itself.
error.4007: You can't create a task relation with an invalid kind of relation.
error.4008: You can't create a task relation which already exists.
error.4009: The task relation does not exist.
error.4010: Cannot relate a task with itself.
error.4011: The task attachment does not exist.
error.4012: The task attachment is too large.
error.4013: The task sort param is invalid.
error.4014: The task sort order is invalid.
error.4015: The task comment does not exist.
error.6004: The team already has access to that project.
error.6005: The user is already a member of that team.
error.6007: The team does not have access to the project to perform that action.
error.7002: Naudotojas jau turi prieigą prie šio projekto.
error.7003: You do not have access to that project.
error.8001: Ši etiketė jau yra prie šios užduoties.
error.8003: You do not have access to this label.
error.10002: The bucket does not belong to that project.
error.10003: You cannot remove the last bucket on a project.
error.10004: You cannot add the task to this bucket as it already exceeded the limit of tasks it can hold.
error.10005: There can be only one done bucket per project.
error.12002: Esi prisiregistravęs prie visko ar prie tėvinio subjekto.
error.13001: Šis dalinimasis nuoroda reikalauja slaptažodžio identifikavimuisi, bet jis nebuvo pateiktas.
error.14001: The provided file is not a valid zip file.
